Service Details: - Makes and donates homemade soup to the Kelowna Women's Shelter and the Richter Street Overnight Program each month- Offers a monthly event in partnership with Okanagan Street Food and SaJ Common Kitchen where participants come together for an evening of soup-making- Each event produces 150-250 servings of nourishing soup that are delivered fresh to the Shelters
Cost: $55/participant (includes soup making under the instruction of a professional facilitator or chef, and a sit-down supper of soup, salad, bread and wine)
